description: Having retained its old shop counter and glass - fronted display cabinets, this former grocer’s shop is perfect for anyone in search of old - world charm. However, the cuisine is the real draw with its focus on quality of the highest level. Wine buffs can ask to visit the wine cellar nearby, housed in a tunnel of Etruscan origin. Simpler dining room on the first floor.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Maestro', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
